description: This is a straight to the point introduction to life coaching course. In the course you will learn the fundamental skills, processes and strategies to be able to start coaching others. This course will put you on the right track to begin your journey as a life coach. The course comprises of both instructional videos and also worksheets for you to complete. It is important that you watch all the videos and complete the worksheets to ensure that you get the best out of your study.   It is also important for you to practice the skills that you learn. I recommend that you find people around you who are open to be coached by you. I wish you all the success and joy on your journey to becoming a life coach!
title: Introduction to life coaching
